snippet: The New York Philharmonic will present a new staged production of “Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street,” Stephen Sondheim’s musical about a murderous hair-cutter, starring the bass-baritone Bryn Terfel in the title role.
abstract: The New York Philharmonic will present a new staged production of “Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street,” Stephen Sondheim’s musical about a murderous hair-cutter, starring the bass-baritone Bryn Terfel in the title role.

headline.main: He Will Have Vengeance (Again): New York Philharmonic to Present 'Sweeney Todd'
headline.print_headline: A Little Off the Top From the Philharmonic
